meaningMnemonic: Who's someone who's just a <radical>mouth</radical> with <radical>legs</radical>? That's your know-it-all <kanji>older brother</kanji>, who won't shut up about anything.
readingMnemonic: You wish you could box your loud-mouth <kanji>older brother</kanji> up and send him far away to <reading>きょう</reading>と. きょうと is super far away from where you currently live, so just ship your older bro off so he can never bother you again.
